pkgmetadata.longdescription: The LIC for Distributed Cosine Regression Analysis // This comprehensive framework for periodic time series modeling is designated as "CLIC" (The LIC for Distributed Cosine Regression Analysis) analysis. It is predicated on the assumption that the underlying data exhibits complex periodic structures beyond simple harmonic components. The philosophy of the method is articulated in Guo G. (2020) doi:10.1080/02664763.2022.2053949.
